BECAUSE EVERYONE WANTS TO BE A MASTERMIND!! Alright! So here we proceed. You can see 12 colours on the top. When the game starts, the computer generates a code of 5 non repeating colours.This code is basically one of the many possible permutations. You need to guess it correctly in less than 10 chances. This is how we start.You need to select any colour from the above 12. Your selected colour is displayed in the box labelled “your curent selection”.Fill all the 5 colours and click on go. Then in the next line follows the clues.
Interpretation of the clues:
RED:correct colour with the correct position.
BLUE:correct colour but placed wrong.
White:wrong colour. Hold on if you are excited. These clues donot correspond to the exact above placed colour. They may correspond to any one of the 5 above filled colours. So build on your next moves according to the clues and try to get all 5 red in less than 10 chances.HOPE YOU BECOME A MASTERMIND!!
